t.style.workflow_what: Determines how each illustration in the video is generated (e.g. FLUX, SD model)
t.style.workflow_how: Place exported image_xxx.json workflow files (API format) in workflows/selfhost/ (local ComfyUI) or workflows/runninghub/ (cloud)
t.style.video_workflow_what: Determines how each video segment is generated (e.g. using different video generation models)
t.style.video_workflow_how: Place exported video_xxx.json workflow files (API format) in workflows/selfhost/ (local ComfyUI) or workflows/runninghub/ (cloud)

t.template.separator_selected: Please select a specific template, not group header
t.template.what: Controls each video frameâ€™s visual layout and design style (title, text, image arrangement, etc.)
t.template.how:
Place .html template files in templates/Size/ directory (e.g. templates/1080x1920/), and the system will auto-group by size. Custom CSS supported.

**Template Naming Rules**

- `static_*.html` â†’ Static style (no AI media gen)
- `image_*.html` â†’ Illustration gen (AI images)
- `video_*.html` â†’ Video gen (AI videos)

**Note**

You must install at least one of the following browsers:
1. Google Chrome (Windows/MacOS)
2. Chromium (Linux)
3. Microsoft Edge
